description.value: Garudas' marksmanship and magic are second nature to you. Whenever you critically hit using a bow, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

rules.text: If the target of the critical hit is adjacent to a surface, it gets stuck to that surface by the missile. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} and must spend an Interact action to attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:10] check to pull the missile free; it can't move from its space until it succeeds. The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a water elemental or some oozes), or could otherwise escape without effort.
